name: Wizards Guild
startIntroPart1: We rule this world with magic!
startIntroPart2: Others can not fathom our true power!
declaringWar: You stand in the way of my people. We will wipe you from this world!
attacked: I will erase you from history! You will regreat every decision you have ever made!
defeated: You may think that I have lost, but we are more powerful then you think, we will return and you will meet death!
introduction: Our magic can bring peace, but threten us an we will destroy!
uniques: Heals [30] damage if it kills a unit
No damage penalty for wounded units

name: Gilded Kingdom
startIntroPart2: Others may get gold but we get MORE!
declaringWar: You stand in the way of gold, prepair to die!
attacked: We may seem weak but we are rich!
defeated: It turns out gold can't buy peace
neutralHello: Provide us with gold and you can live
hateHello: give us your gold or else
uniques: [-50]% Gold cost of acquiring tiles [in all cities]

name: Everglade
declaringWar: You sadly leave us no choice. War is the only option
attacked: Looks like you did not want peace
